entry.title: Do something nice for yourself today

link.title: Do something nice for yourself today

entry.content:
Do something nice for yourself today. 
You deserve a break. 
Self-care is how you take your power back.

There are lots of possible explanation for benefit of acupuncture and herbal medicine. But the people are not interested in the explanation of the medical approach. We already have too much about many things to care about in daily life. Just let me know about your concern or come to ask for help. No matter how small or big issues, all of your concerns are taken care of by our care staff. You just should do small good stuff for yourself today.

#YouDeserveIt #SelfCare
entry.summary: Do something nice for yourself today. You deserve a break. Self-care is how you take your power back.

entry.title: 무료 미술 힐링강의 (칼라와 에너지)
entry.content:
무료 미술 힐링강의 (칼라와 에너지) 1

“칼라와 그림이 우리에게 얼마나 큰 영향력을 갖고 있는지 알아보는 시간입니다.”

“언제 사랑의 감정을 느껴보셨습니까?”

새로운 그림의 세계를 알게 되는 경이로움과 충만함, 그리고 그림과 나누는 포근한 사랑의 시간이 앞으로 계속 밴쿠버에서 이어집니다.

강의 주제는 계속 바뀝니다.

  • 그림과 파동
  • 그림과 감정이 몸에 미치는 영향
  • 그림에 담긴 외유내강
  • 미술과 분위기

시간: 매주 월, 토 2시-4시

장소: Ryu Clinic

예약과 문의: 소화 마리아 778.866.8770

References

  1. 소화님블로그 ↩
entry.summary: 무료 미술 힐링강의 (칼라와 에너지) 1 “칼라와 그림이 우리에게 얼마나 큰 영향력을 갖고 있는지 알아보는 시간입니다.” 소화님블로그 ↩

entry.title: 2018 Summer Holiday Closing Notice
entry.content: Please be informed that we will be closed from July 23 to 28 due to the Summer Holiday Closing. Inquiries during holidays will be reply after July 30. Thank you for your understanding and continued support with us.
entry.summary: Please be informed that we will be closed from July 23 to 28 due to the Summer Holiday Closing. Inquiries during holidays will be reply after July 30. Thank you for your understanding and continued support with us.

entry.title: Underground Free Parking
entry.content:
We have 1.5 hours free underground parking. Parking for all patrons on the P1 level of the parkade will be free for the first 90 minutes, but will require vehicle registration at the various metres installed around the site, or by using Impark’s Hangtag App. Pay parking will be in effect for any parker’s who require to park for longer than 90 minutes.

It’s all connected to Thrifty food store parkade. You can come up directly from P1(Liquor store parking area) with elevator. Directions
entry.summary: We have 1.5 hours free underground parking. Parking for all patrons on the P1 level of the parkade will be free for the first 90 minutes, but will require vehicle registration at the various metres installed around the site, or by using Impark’s Hangtag App. Pay parking will be in effect for any parker’s who require to park for longer than 90 minutes.
